question: Fariduddin Masud died in which of the following year?
explanation: Fariduddin Masud also known as Baba Farid Ganj-i Shakar settled down in the small town of Ajodhan in Punjab. In Ajodhan, he established a khanaqa close to the main mosque of the town. When Farid died in 1271 CE, he was buried in his khanaqa.
